author: civanch
body:
Magnetic monopole simulation was established for run-1, when previous Geant4 version 9.4 was used. In this PR monopole simulation was reviewed for 10.4, which should work in MT mode. In Geant4 Monopole simulation is demonstrated and tested in so-called "extended example monopole", which is a part of Geant4 distribution.

Following modifications are included in this PR:

1) In the recent CMSSW it is not possible directly copy classes from the "monopole" example, so new classes within CMSSW are created according to CMSSW rules and code requirements: Monopole, MonopoleEquation, MonopoleTransportation

2) Monopole physics constructor for Physics List instantiation is updated for Geant4 10.4

3) G4SystemOfUnits.hh and G4PhysicsConstants.hh headers are removed from header files of CMSSW sub-librraies updated in this PR, instead CLHEP namespace is used. This is a recommended by the Geant4 team.

No change in the mainstream simulation is expected.
title: Geant4 monopole simulation
